talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Elf Guard Citridel$
{user_nick}! Are you still busy?

${user_nick}$
Yeah. It looks like Argenta is at Abyss of Heat. I must hurry.

$Elf Guard Citridel$
I see. If anything happens to you, I will stake my life and enter the Monolith to save you!
*You cannot proceed in a party.

${user_nick}$
(Hurry to the Abyss of Heat.)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$Gerraint$
You're late! Why are you always so late?!
(Gerraint is fuming)

*You cannot proceed in a party.

$Argenta$
Seriously... what was that thing?!

${user_nick}$
Argenta! Are you hurt?

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_01.ogg}
You wretched kid, what took you so long!!

${user_nick}$
I'm sorry... Feder attacked the Tree of Life and I had to put out the fire on it... and I ran into Lunaria... I came here as fast as I could.

$Gerraint$
What?! You already knew tentang Lunaria?
You're no help at all! Why are you telling us only now?!

$Argenta$
So you already knew tentang Lunaria, but put the safety of the elves and the Tree of Life before my safety.
Hmph! (Argenta frowns)

${user_nick}$
I'm sorry...

$Argenta$
...Phew...(Argenta smacks your head)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way! You're the strongest living thing in this world!</html>
<html>No way!! I thought you'd be fine.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
What are you sorry about? Did you think that girl would kill me or something? Do I look that weak to you??

$Argenta$
(Argenta straightens her cloak)
I wonder why humans always make such a fuss over nothing. I remember that Lunaria now. Why is she still around??

${user_nick}$
You know her?

$Argenta$
I didn't know she had such irritating abilities, but I know what she is.
Argh! This is annoying! I should have tracked her down beforehand. Now she's trying to mess things up.

$Argenta$
Now I understand why Feder is so active.
How are we going to deal with a time traveller?

${user_nick}$
Oh! Right, I brought this.
Look! (Show her the Ancient's stone) Maybe this can stop Lunaria.

$Argenta$
(Argenta is suprised)
How did you get this...?!!

${user_nick}$
Gaharam gave it to me. By the way... (tell her what Gaharam said and your conversation with Lunaria)

$Argenta$
So the Ancient named Gaharam gave you this? Hmm... well...(Argenta stares at you)

${user_nick}$
Something wrong?

$Argenta$
I have no choice but to take you with me.
Take that stone with you and follow me to the Monolith's door.

$Gerraint$
What?! If that stone is so important, we can take it ourselves!
Why do you want this weakling to tag along? Humans will only be burdens.

$Argenta$
I have my reasons. You better not touch that thing, Gerraint.
I'll explain later, get along now.

$Gerraint$
Hmph!
(Gerraint leads the way reluctantly)

$Argenta$
Let's go. Try your best to keep up with us.
(Go further into the Abyss of Heat.)

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_03.ogg}
Now I can Pergilah ke door alone from here.
Give me the stone and go back. You've done your part.

${user_nick}$
What? But I thought you can't touch this stone.

$Argenta$
Of course I can.
It's just that I didn't want to touch such a suspicious looking stone.

${user_nick}$
(That's different from what she said earlier)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No! Tell me your real reason first!</html>
<html>No, it might be dangerous to you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
...Seriously... you irritating kid.
I can't tell you but I have my reasons. So hand it over. Quick!

$Argenta$
What?!

${user_nick}$
...I came here to fight too... I want to be of help.
I know I'm much weaker than you, but I followed you here thinking that maybe I can help you in at least a small way.
I'm not going to run away now after coming all the way here.

$Argenta$
I'm not asking you to run away. This is a strategic retreat. You've done your part.
You've found this stone and brought it to me. No one can or will blame you.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_04.ogg}
Now go back. I'll tell the others that you've been a good slave.

${user_nick}$
...how you are going to tell the others if something happens to you or... when you die?
Argenta, I just want to help.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_05.ogg}
Don't be so stubborn! I don't know how things will go from now on so don't even think tentang tagging along. You can't win Feder. In fact he can kill you with a flick of his fingers. Don't you understand how strong a dragon with two jewels can be?

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_06.ogg}
...there were fools in the past who stubbornly chose to fight until the end. You know what happened to them, how terrible their endings were.

${user_nick}$
Are you talking tentang the Six Heroes...?

$Argenta$
Yeah, those stupid humans and elves.
You must have learnt something since you had the chance to see them up close.
Those fools who stood up for "justice" ended up leading a terrible life until their death.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_07.ogg}
Run away. Don't live in agony for the rest of your life by making a stupid decision here.
No one will blame you...

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_08.ogg}
You've already done enough to be considered a hero by the humans.
You can lead the rest of your life with fame and honour that the humans love so much.
Go back without getting injured and enjoy all the riches. What more do you want from life?

${user_nick}$
...No I don't want that.

$Argenta$
What?

${user_nick}$
...Terramai also said the same thing. He said he never regretted taking part in the Black Dragon Raid. He said he would make the same decision even if he had the chance to choose again.

${user_nick}$
That's exactly how I feel. If I run away now, I'll regret it for the rest of my life.
The fact that I wasn't able to help you will torture me more than anything else.

$Argenta$
...Terramai that irritating kid...
(There's a murderous look in Argenta's eyes)

$Argenta$
I don't know what he told you, but didn't you come here for the title of a hero?
Are you really going to stake your life in this fight?

${user_nick}$
Of course I would love to be a hero and admire all the great heroes...
but running away now is not what a hero would do. And it's not what Argenta's friend would do either.

$Argenta$
Hah! You? My friend? This is absurd. I never considered you as a friend.
Go back now before I get really angry!

${user_nick}$
I spent so much time with you and saw how hard you try to save this world. Even if you consider me as a friend, I'll still follow you.

${user_nick}$
I admire your strength and I think you are the greatest and most awesome living thing in this world. I really hope you won't get hurt.
It's only natural for me to want to help someone who is working so hard to protect this world!

$Argenta$
You really are a stubborn little one...

$Argenta$
I never expected you to come all the way here with me when I first met you at Calderock Village. You're a real fool. Why are all the humans and dragons around me complete idiots?!!

${user_nick}$
I am a servant of the Goddess, the Goddess who protects this world. It's only natural that I want to help when you are trying so hard to protect this world too!

${user_nick}$
I don't exactly love this world so much that I want to save it. My life has been a series of annoying, stupid mistakes... and I really wanted to destroy it when my parents abandoned me.

${user_nick}$
But I came to realize that life isn't so bad afterall. I don't want to run away from it. I'm only trying to save my own world, why are you telling me what to do? I've made up my mind. I'm going further into the Monolith. You can follow me if you like.

${user_nick}$
As a daughter of the Tree of Life whose roots spread deep under the Monolith, I can't just ignore this and run away!
I will come with you. I believe that it is my Telesia.

${user_nick}$
...of course I respect heroes and all that. I want to become one too. But I know, that the history books don't have my name recorded in them. The heroes whom I've met must be doing their best too in their path to become the celebrated heroes.

${user_nick}$
Besides... I'm a dragon like you! I have a fragment of Ancient Dragon's jewel.
No matter how small it may seem, I have my own mission to protect this world!

${user_nick}$
Please let me come with you. I was made with a Dragon's jewel too!
I want to fulfill my duties as a fragment of a dragon.

$Argenta$
....you're a dragon? You have Ancient Dragon's jewel?(Argenta observes you carefully)Goodness, your jewel is so small that I didn't even notice it! Do you think you can call yourself a dragon with that?

${user_nick}$
Strength is not what all there is... I will fulfill my mission. If you stop me... I'll... I'll get angry!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She's going to kill me if I really throw a tantrum)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Okay.

$Argenta$
(She's not even listening)
Why are all those born from Ancient Dragon's jewel like this? One is a fool, and this one is... another fool. Even if they're resurrected, they'll still be resurrrected as fools... Ancient Dragon must be a really messed up dragon.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I think I'm the normal one here)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
But at least I'm normal so that's a relief.

${user_nick}$
A...hero...? I don't care tentang that. I just want to stop Lunaria.

$Argenta$
What? You know her well?

${user_nick}$
Actually... I don't belong to this time period. I am from the past... but Lunaria brought me here. Because of her time warps, my time has always been messed up ever since I met her.

${user_nick}$
But even in all that mess, Lunaria and I helped the other adventurers. We did what we could to help save this world.

${user_nick}$
...So... I don't think Lunaria's real intention is to destroy this world... there must be something that I don't understand yet. I'll stop Lunaria, I'll do whatever I can.

$Argenta$
Wow that makes me SO REASSURED. You followed Lunaria all along? What the heck are you? Are you even human?

$Argenta$
(She seems determined to smash your handsome face)

$Argenta$
You're still in the mood to joke around? Anyway, I understand that you can stop Lunaria. Though I didn't see you much, trying to be responsible for your own mistakes is... not bad for a human.

$Argenta$
...I'm warning you now. I don't know what might happen later.
Feder might attack us, or Lunaria might pop up...

$Argenta$
...and maybe I'll free my powers.
If I decide that I need to act swiftly, I will break the seal stone and release my power completely.

${user_nick}$
Can you do that?!

$Argenta$
...well, it's maintained by my power so if I take my power back, then it'll Kembali ke its original state.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Of course. You won't regret taking me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
...the door can't just be opened by anyone too.
Anyway, if you try to do anything foolish, you'll die in my hands.

$Argenta${sound:npc_Argenta_9430_qu_09.ogg}
You'll take care of your own life from now on.
I will never try to save you. You save your own ass if you want to return alive!

${user_nick}$
Yes ma'am!

${user_nick}$
...!! You're...!

${user_nick}$
Gaharam?!

${user_nick}$
Master?!
<html>$Quest Complete$</FONT></html>

$Gaharam$
...

qstep_change.comment: 대화 종료 시 컷신으로 끝나면 6스텝 5저널 변경 가하람 생성

journal.title: Result of Hesitation 1
journal.contents:
Argenta seems to be injured after fighting Lunaria.
She went towards the Abyss of Heat so follow her.

Anu Arendel (Fire Mountain Entrance) → Abyss of Heat (Argenta)
journal.todo_msg: Quest ditambahkan. Pergilah ke Abyss of Heat dan temui Argenta.

journal.title: Result of Hesitation 2
journal.contents:
You have been scolded by Argenta... But luckily the ancient stone saved you.
Follow Argenta.

Anu Arendel (Fire Mountain Entrance) → Abyss of Heat (Argenta)
journal.todo_msg: Advance into the Abyss of Heat with Argenta.

journal.title: Result of Hesitation 3
journal.contents:
You've reached the end. Talk to Argenta.

Anu Arendel (Fire Mountain Entrance) → Abyss of Heat (Argenta)

journal.title: Result of Hesitation 4
journal.contents:
Follow Argenta and go near the door of the Monolith.

Anu Arendel (Fire Mountain Entrance) → Abyss of Heat (Argenta)
journal.todo_msg: Follow Argenta to the gate of the Monolith.

journal.title: Result of Hesitation 5
journal.contents:
Gaharam has appeared. Talk to her.

Anu Arendel (Fire Mountain Entrance) → Abyss of Heat (Gaharam)
